reviews.review_msg: Her forensic psychology class was fair, exams easy if you study adequately!

She's kinda dull as a speaker but she knows what she's talking about and gives loads of examples and is clear about what she's talking about. There's nothing special about her but she was fair and conveyed the material properly
I only atteneded 2  of the lectures and you can get away with studying and making your own notes. Midterms and finals pretty easy got around a B on all of them WITHOUT ever going to class.

Best thing about this class were the exams were fair. Fairly easy questions that don't go into great detail. However, she doesn't give you any guidelines on what to study. Overall, she was a fair and approachable prof.

Catherine is a friendly professor that you can contact for help. However, the lectures are fairly boring and unnecessary because everything that you need is in the textbook. She and her TAs are really really strict about APA  formatting for the assignments   (trust me!). Midterms are MC and SA; while the final is 100 MC.

Cathy is super nice! Her lectures arent't the most engaging, but the information is easily accessible as it is all in the textbook. Overall good class, could've been made a bit more interesting- as the subject is really great.
Nice and pretty easy teacher. Available when needed. Lectures are organized and often end early :) As long as you study for the exams you will do well on them (2 midterms and one final)

She's a nice teacher but she doesn't seem passionate about the material. I like psyc, but i don't like the way she teaches it. Shes the teacher who is just doing research for the school and has to teach.
